remarks: Over a division ring, all nonzero polynomials are unitic.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
statement:
drnguc1p.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
drnguc1p.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
drnguc1p.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) $.
drnguc1p.c $e |- C = ( Unic1p ` R ) $.
drnguc1p $p |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ F e. B /\ F =/= .0. ) -> F e. C ) $.
